content: Planning a cross country trip back to the Pacific Northwest from DC. My partner was caught up in the mess of probationary firings & RIFs at HHS and we decided that things were a bit too uncertain out here, especially while trying to raise two littles. We're going to live with the grandparents for the summer and then are heading to Spokane, WA in August for our next chapter of life. We're going to try and settle for bit, put down some roots while the littles grow.

A lot has changed since my last update. What was supposed to be a short summer in Portland turned into a permanent move after my partner got a job offer with the State of Oregon. We even bought a house and are now officially NoPos (North Portlanders)! Couldn't be happier!
